categories: Category:Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition

nodes.text: Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition 4
Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition 4 was the fourth and final issue in the Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition series of comics. It was released April 2, 1997.

The all-new adaptation of the first Star Wars motion picture continues! So special is this Special Edition motion picture that Dark Horse is releasing the comics version simultaneously as a four-issue, monthly comics series and as a single-volume, trade paperback collection. The covers of the four-issue series are each painted by Dave Dorman, and, when placed beside one another, they form one massive Star Wars image with the Death Star at the center.
